entry.title: We're Beer Critics (Jk)
entry.content: So I’ve been trying out a few different beers with my roomate recently. I don’t I’m qualified to rate any of these, but to me they were all good. I like the ligheter beers more beacause I prefer the frutier, citrusy type after taste. And it’s not necessarily that strong either, but it still finished with a nice feel on your toungue. The darker beers have a stronger flavor but sometimes the residue on the toungue is too strong. I’ll definitly be having more pretentious ale reviews on a per beer basis. But for now….
